data.name: KaBoom!
data.detailed_description:
The world is in danger, but no worries, you are here to save the day!
Destroy the asteroids!
Pew pew pew, KaBOOM!

KaBoom! is an arcade game which includes an easy to start but hard to master mechanic, where you can destroy asteroids by firing the correct laser!
And there will be plenty of power ups to aid you in your journey!



The higher your score, the harder the game becomes! Reach new highscores to unlock new gorgeous skins for your spaceship!
All while enjoying the ear meltingly good chiptune OST!
